verses.verse: And when the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was over, <S%G1230><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> and Mary <S%G3137><s%> the [mother] of James, <S%G2385><s%> and Salome, <S%G4539><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> spices, <S%G759><s%> that they might come <S%G2064><s%> and anoint <S%G218><s%> Him.

And very <S%G3029><s%> early <S%G4404><s%> on the first <S%G1520><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to the tomb <S%G3418><s%> when the sun <S%G2246><s%> had risen. <S%G393><s%>

And they were saying <S%G3004><s%> to one <S%G1438><s%> another, <S%G1438><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> will roll <S%G617><s%> away <S%G617><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> for us from the entrance <S%G2374><s%> of the tomb <S%G3419><s%>?"

And looking <S%G308><s%> up, they saw <S%G2334><s%> that the stone <S%G3037><s%> had been rolled <S%G7502><s%> away, <S%G7502><s%> although <S%G1063><s%> it was extremely <S%G4970><s%> large. <S%G3173><s%>

And entering <S%G1525><s%> the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> they saw <S%G3708><s%> a young <S%G3495><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> at the right, <S%G1188><s%> wearing <S%G4016><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> robe; <S%G4749><s%> and they were amazed. <S%G1568><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do not be amazed; <S%G1568><s%> you are looking <S%G2212><s%> for Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Nazarene, <S%G3479><s%> who has been crucified. <S%G4717><s%> He has risen; <S%G1453><s%> He is not here; <S%G5602><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> [here is] the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> they laid <S%G5087><s%> Him.

"But go, <S%G5217><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> and Peter, <S%G4074><s%> 'He is going <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you into Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> you will see <S%G3708><s%> Him, just <S%G2531><s%> as He said <S%G3004><s%> to you.'"

And they went <S%G1831><s%> out and fled <S%G5343><s%> from the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> for trembling <S%G5156><s%> and astonishment <S%G1611><s%> had gripped <S%G2192><s%> them; and they said <S%G3004><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to anyone, <S%G3762><s%> for they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

[Now <S%G1161><s%> after He had risen <S%G450><s%> early <S%G4404><s%> on the first <S%G4413><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> He first <S%G4413><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> to Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> from whom <S%G3739><s%> He had cast <S%G1544><s%> out seven <S%G2033><s%> demons. <S%G1140><s%>
She went <S%G4198><s%> and reported <S%G518><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who had been <S%G1096><s%> with Him, while they were mourning <S%G3996><s%> and weeping. <S%G2799><s%>
And when they heard <S%G191><s%> that He was alive, <S%G2198><s%> and had been seen <S%G2300><s%> by her, they refused <S%G569><s%> to believe <S%G569><s%> it.

And after <S%G3326><s%> that, He appeared <S%G5319><s%> in a different <S%G2087><s%> form <S%G3444><s%> to two <S%G1417><s%> of them, while they were walking <S%G4043><s%> along on their way <S%G4198><s%> to the country. <S%G68><s%>
And they went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and reported <S%G518><s%> it to the others, <S%G3062><s%> but they did not believe <S%G4100><s%> them either. <S%G3761><s%>

And afterward <S%G5305><s%> He appeared <S%G5319><s%> to the eleven <S%G1733><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%> as they were reclining <S%G345><s%> [at the table;] and He reproached <S%G3679><s%> them for their unbelief <S%G570><s%> and hardness <S%G4641><s%> of heart, <S%G4641><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they had not believed <S%G4100><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who had seen <S%G2300><s%> Him after He had risen. <S%G1453><s%>
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Go <S%G4198><s%> into all <S%G537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> and preach <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> creation. <S%G2937><s%>
"He who has believed <S%G4100><s%> and has been baptized <S%G907><s%> shall be saved; <S%G4982><s%> but he who has disbelieved <S%G569><s%> shall be condemned. <S%G2632><s%>

"And these <S%G3778><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> will accompany <S%G3877><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who have believed: <S%G4100><s%> in My name <S%G3686><s%> they will cast <S%G1544><s%> out demons, <S%G1140><s%> they will speak <S%G2980><s%> with new <S%G2537><s%> tongues; <S%G1100><s%>

they will pick <S%G142><s%> up serpents, <S%G3789><s%> and if <S%G2579><s%> they drink <S%G4095><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> deadly <S%G2286><s%> [poison,] it shall not hurt <S%G984><s%> them; they will lay <S%G2007><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on the sick, <S%G732><s%> and they will recover. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2573><s%> "

So <S%G3767><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> when the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had spoken <S%G2980><s%> to them, He was received <S%G353><s%> up into heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> at the right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And they went <S%G1831><s%> out and preached <S%G2784><s%> everywhere, <S%G3837><s%> while the Lord <S%G2962><s%> worked <S%G4903><s%> with them, and confirmed <S%G950><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> by the signs <S%G4592><s%> that followed. <S%G1872><s%>] [[And they promptly reported all these instructions to Peter and his companions. And after <S%G3326><s%> that, Jesus Himself sent out through them from east to west the sacred and imperishable proclamation of eternal salvation.]]
